S03n227:2: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syāt?
S03n227:4: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavānbhāgyātiśayaguṇādutthānasampadā cādhigatavipuladhanasamṛddhiraviṣamavyavahāraśīlatvālloke bahumānaniketabhūta udārābhijanavānanekavidyākalāvikalpādhigamavimalataramatirguṇamāhātmyādrājñā samupahṛtasammānaḥ pradānaśīlatvāllokasādhāraṇavibhavaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva |
S03n227:6: tyāgaśauryonnataṃ nāma tasya vyāpa diśo daśa ||1 ||
S03n227:10: sattvārthiduḥkhaṃ na śaśāka soḍhuṃ nāstīti vaktuṃ ca tato jugopa ||3 ||
S03n227:11: atha kadācittasya mahāsattvasya bhojanakāle snātānuliptagātrasya kuśalodārasūdopakalpite samupasthitevarṇagandharasasparśādiguṇasamudite vicitre bhakṣyabhojyādividhau tatpuṇyasambhārābhivṛddhikāmo jñānāgninirdagdhasarvakleśendhanaḥ pratyekabuddhastadgṛhamabhijagāma bhikṣārthī |
S03n227:15: atha māraḥ pāpīyānbodhisattvasya tāṃ dānasampadamamṛṣyamāṇastadvidhnārthamantarā ca taṃ bhadantamantarā ca dvāradehalīṃ pracalajvālākarālodaramanekapauruṣamatigambhīraṃ bhayānakadarśanaṃ sapratibhayanirghoṣaṃ narakamabhinirmame visphuradbhiranekairjanaśatairācitam |
S03n227:16: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ bhikṣārthinamabhigatamālokya patnīmuvāca-bhadre ! svayamāryāya paryāptaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dehīti |
S03n227:17: sā tatheti pratiśrutya praṇītaṃ bhakṣyabhojyamādāya prasthitā |
S03n227:19: kimetaditi ca bhartrā paryanuyuktā samāpatitasādhvasāpihitakaṇṭhī tatkathañcittasmai kathayāmāsa |
S03n227:20: atha bodhisattvaḥ kathamayamāryo madgṛhādanavāptabhikṣa eva pratiyāsyatīti sasambhramaṃ tattasyāḥ kathitamanādṛtya svayameva ca praṇītaṃ bhakṣyabhojyamādāya tasya mahātmanaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitukāmo dvārakoṣṭhakasamīpamabhigatastamatibhīṣaṇamantarā narakaṃ dadarśa |
S03n227:21: tasya kiṃ svididamiti samutpannavitarkasya māraḥ pāpīyānbhavanabhitterviniḥsṛtya saṃdṛśyamānadivyādbhūtavapurantarikṣe sthitvā hitakāma iva nāmābravīt-gṛhapate mahārauravanāmāyaṃ mahānarakaḥ |
S03n227:24: arthastrivargasya viśeṣahetustasminhate kena hato na dharmaḥ |
S03n227:25: dharmaṃ ca hatvārthanibarhaṇena kathaṃ nu na syānnarakapratiṣṭhaḥ ||6 ||
S03n227:26: dānaprasaṅgena ca dharmamūlaṃ ghnatā tvayārthaṃ yadakāri pāpam |
S03n227:28: tatsādhu dānādviniyaccha buddhimevaṃ hi sadyaḥpatanaṃ na te syāt |
S03n227:32: atha bodhisattvo nūnamasyaitaddurātmano mama dānavighnāya viceṣṭitamityavagamya sattvāvaṣṭambhadhīraṃ vinayamadhurāvicchedaṃ niyatamityavocadenam |
S03n227:34: yuktā viśeṣeṇa ca daivateṣu parānukampānipuṇā pravṛttiḥ ||10 ||
S03n227:35: doṣodayātpūrvamanantaraṃ vā yuktaṃ tu tacchāntipathena gantum |
S03n227:37: idaṃ ca dānavyasanaṃ madīyaṃ śaṅke cikitsāviṣayavyatītam |
S03n227:38: tathā hyanādṛtya hitaiṣitāṃ te na me manaḥ saṅkacati pradānāt ||12 ||
S03n227:39: dānādadharmaṃ ca yadūcivāṃstvamarthaṃ ca dharmasya viśeṣahetum |
S03n227:41: nidhīyamānaḥ sa nu dharmahetuścauraiḥ prasahyātha vilupyamānaḥ |
S03n227:43: yaccāttha dātā narakaṃ prayāti pratigrahītā tu surendralokam |
S03n227:44: vivardhitastena ca me tvayā'yaṃ dānodyamaḥ saṃyamayiṣyatāpi ||15 ||
S03n227:45: ananyathā cāstu vacastavedaṃ svargaṃ ca me yācanakā vrajantu |
S03n227:46: dānaṃ hi me lokahitārthamiṣṭaṃ nedaṃ svasaukhyodayasādhanāya ||16 ||
S03n227:47: atha sa māraḥ pāpīyānpunarapi bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣīva dhīrahastenovāca-
S03n227:48: hitoktimetāṃ mama cāpalaṃ vā samīkṣya yenecchasi tena gaccha |
S03n227:49: sukhānvito vā bahumānapūrvaṃ smartāsi māṃ vipratisāravānvā ||17 ||
S03n227:55: ityuktvā bodhisattvaḥ svabhāgyabalāvaṣṭambhājjānānaśca niratyayatāṃ dānasya nivāraṇaikarasamavadhūya svajanaparijanaṃ sādhvasānabhibhūtamatirabhivṛddhadānābhilāṣo narakamadhyena prāyāt |
S03n227:58: atha bodhisattvaḥ padmasaṃkrameṇa svapuṇyātiśayanirjātenābhigamya pratyekabuddhaṃ prasādasaṃharṣāpūrṇahṛdayaḥ piṇḍapātamasmai prāyacchat |
S03n227:62: tamabhimukhamudīkṣituṃ na sehe saha narakeṇa tatastirobabhūva ||21 ||
S03n227:65: kena nāma svasthena na dātavyaṃ syāt ?
